item.description:
Jill Butler will be our speaker. Jill, a visionary communicator, is an accomplished artist, author/illustrator, entrepreneur, and keynote speaker on the subject of discovering your individual gifts and creating your authentic life.

What is your relationship with your home? Are there certain rooms you just love, and others you can’t stand to walk into? In this gathering, we will explore the hidden metaphors that always creep up when exploring how our “stuff” and our spaces reflect our lives. We will also delve into aligning your personal vision with your space, to create a space you truly deserve. Jill is an AMAZING facilitator. This presentation will make a HUGE IMPACT!

Doors open at 8:30
Speaker presents from 9 to 10
$5 meeting fee will be collected at the door

Warm your bones in the company of fabulous women at our January meeting.

Your leadership team is considering logo designs. We'll bring some of our candidates to the meeting for your feedback.



The Shoreline Association of Women Business Leaders (AWBL) is a community of professionals who network, brainstorm and empower each other in their business pursuits. More than a networking group, AWBL has a strong mentoring aspect to assist members in growing their businesses while maintaining balance. Join us!
item.name: January AWBL Meeting “You and Your Relationship to Your Home.”
